detectors.description: ROOMs.random(uint256,uint256) (contracts/ROOMs.sol#258-260) uses a weak PRNG: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.difficulty,block.timestamp,blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1)))) % (max - min + 1) + min (contracts/ROOMs.sol#259)
ROOMs.closeRoomRaffle(uint256) (contracts/ROOMs.sol#108-140) uses a weak PRNG: raffle.participants[i].id == raffle.winner.id (contracts/ROOMs.sol#125)
ROOMs.getRoomByTokenId(uint256) (contracts/ROOMs.sol#229-232) uses a weak PRNG: roomById[roomId] (contracts/ROOMs.sol#231)
ROOMs.closeRoomRaffle(uint256) (contracts/ROOMs.sol#108-140) uses a weak PRNG: i < raffle.participants.length (contracts/ROOMs.sol#123)
